Tabs

Tabs go way back. There was a beverage called Tab that was pretty sweet. You should keep tabs on it. Some cats are tabby, so a tabby cat driving a taxi is a tabby cabbie... no more Tab for this man.

Are is the wrong way to spell the letter 'R,' but who are we to judge?'
